narrative.title: 15 Panzer Division - 1942Q3
narrative.situation: German Panzer-Division deployed in North Africa during 1942Q3.
narrative.objectives: Mobile armored spearhead for breakthrough operations
narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.

special_rules: Long-range tank gunnery (Panzer IV F2 opened fire at long range at Alam Halfa)
